content: @Mario Carneiro Can you explain the motivation behind the refactor? Why did you want to change the definition in the first place?

It's more like a continuation of the work done in the file. I had planned to do this a while ago but got sidetracked. Basically, when you use list instead of list_blank, you have to keep track of how many blanks you have left on the tape as a result of moving over them and back again. This version has less definitional equality so more rewriting is involved, but the constructions are simpler.
